msg.msgText: The HTTP request is not authorized.

msgExplanation.p: The HTTP request that was sent to Message Gateway does not contain an Authorization header, or the Authorization header is not valid. The HTTP request can be resubmitted with a valid Authorization header. This is commonly done by browsers using a dialog to ask for user name and password. Browsers commonly remember a previously specified user name and password, so if these change, it might be necessary to restart the browser to clear this cache.

msgUserResponse.p: Add an Authorization header with a user name and password and resubmit the request. This is commonly done in browsers by setting user name and password in a challenge dialog. If you are using curl, add a -u option.
